mapper.sql: select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, viewCnt, commentCnt, regDate, modiDate from board order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, modiDate = now() where writer=#{writer} and bno =#{bno} ;
mapper.delete: delete from board where writer=#{writer} and bno =#{bno} ;
mapper.update: update board set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where bno = #{bno};
